title: Has a woman been sentenced to five years for sending her son to a better school?
subtitle: The differences between the provisions of white swimmers and those of the homeless mother, Tanya McDowell, which portray inequality in the criminal justice system.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: Professional athletes have been lightly sentenced for serious crimes, while a homeless mother has been sentenced to five years' imprisonment for joining her son at the wrong Connecticut school.
